sentences.en: a small band of volunteers
sentences.cn: 一小批志愿者

sentences.en: All the band come from good, solid, working-class backgrounds.
sentences.cn: 所有的乐手都来自值得我们尊敬的工人阶级。

sentences.en: Bruce Springsteen has re-hired his muso collective, the E Street Band.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯·斯普林斯汀重新组建了他的音乐团队，E街乐队。

sentences.en: Columbia recently resigned the band for a cool $30 million.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚唱片公司最近以3,000万美元的高价再次签下这个乐队。

sentences.en: For a decade "X" was the pre-eminent punk band in Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 10年来，“X”乐队一直都是洛杉矶最杰出的朋克乐队。

sentences.en: He spent his adolescent years playing guitar in the church band.
sentences.cn: 他在教堂的乐队里弹吉他，度过了他的青少年时期。

sentences.en: I grew up playing in rock bands.
sentences.cn: 我是在摇滚乐队里玩音乐长大的。

sentences.en: I learned a lot from him about how to run a band.
sentences.cn: 我从他那里学到了许多关于经营乐队方面的东西.

sentences.en: Interest rates stayed within a relatively narrow band.
sentences.cn: 利率在一个相对较小的范围内波动。

sentences.en: interviews with band members
sentences.cn: 对乐队成员的采访

sentences.en: Kat Bjelland has been playing live with her new band.
sentences.cn: 凯特·比耶兰最近一直在与她的新乐队作现场表演。

sentences.en: My underskirt had ridden up into a thick band around my hips.
sentences.cn: 我的衬裙已经蹿到臀部，厚厚地卷成一圈。

sentences.en: papers held together with a rubber band
sentences.cn: 用橡皮筋捆在一起的文件

sentences.en: Short-wave radio uses the 20-50 metre band.
sentences.cn: 短波收音机用的波段是20–50米。

sentences.en: Smith joined the band in 1989.
sentences.cn: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.en: The band alternated romantic love songs with bouncy dance numbers.
sentences.cn: 乐队轮番献上浪漫情歌和劲歌热舞。

sentences.en: The band have moved forward their Leeds date to October 27.
sentences.cn: 乐队已把去利兹的日期提前至10月27号。

sentences.en: The band struck up, and riders paraded round the ring.
sentences.cn: 乐队开始奏乐，骑手们列队绕场行进。

sentences.en: The band was forced to cancel a string of live dates.
sentences.cn: 乐队被迫取消了一系列的现场表演。

sentences.en: The band was playing old Beatles songs.
sentences.cn: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.en: The band was starting to play a fast, loud number.
sentences.cn: 乐队奏起一首很大声的快歌。

sentences.en: The entertainment includes a disco and live band .
sentences.cn: 娱乐活动有跳迪斯科和乐队现场演奏。

sentences.en: They formed a band when they were still at school.
sentences.cn: 他们还在读书的时候就组建了一个乐队。

sentences.en: They still get treated differently from almost every other contemporary British band.
sentences.cn: 他们所得到的待遇仍然与当代几乎所有其他英国乐队都不同。

sentences.en: Three members of the band went down with flu.
sentences.cn: 这个乐队有3名成员得了流感。

sentences.en: We band together to resist our enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们联合起来抵抗我们的敌人。

words.tran_cn: 带；乐队；松紧带；一帮；传送带

phrases.tran_cn: 基带，窄带；基频带；基极信号
军乐队；奏进行曲作操练表演的乐队
[计]窄带，窄频带；[经]狭小汇率幅度
宽频带；规定较大幅度的浮动汇率制度

trans.tran_cn: 乐队，一群人，带子，条纹，（数值）范围，波段
trans.tran_en: a group of musicians, especially a group that plays popular music
